name: @tokentop/plugin-sdk
description: SDK for building tokentop plugins â€” providers, agents, themes, and notifications

scripts.build: bun run build:types && bun run build:js
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && bun build src/types/index.ts --outdir dist/types --target node --format esm && bun build src/helpers/index.ts --outdir dist/helpers --target node --format esm && bun build src/testing/index.ts --outdir dist/testing --target node --format esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build

author: Nigel Bazzeghin <nbazzeghin@gmail.com>
